hero_slide2_subtitle: A Kick of Flavor in Every Bite
hero_slide3_subtitle: Only the Best Cuts for the Best Jerky

products.description: Discover the pure taste of Navarrete Beef Jerky with our Natural Flavor. No frills, just the rich, savory goodness of premium beef seasoned to perfection.
The best combination of flavors, without a doubt, is lemon with pepper, and in our Navarrete Beef Jerky, it tastes even better.
Experience a zesty twist with Navarrete Beef Jerky's Spicy Lemon flavor. The refreshing citrus notes meet a kick of spice, creating a vibrant taste that will leave you wanting more.
Feel the heat with Navarrete Beef Jerky's Hot & Spicy flavor. This bold and fiery blend of spices will awaken your senses and satisfy your cravings for something truly intense.

location_address: 8152 Dyer St Suite 8202, El Paso, TX 79904
